actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Judiciary, S. Rept. 96-961.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill S. 2052 entitled "A bill for the relief of The Merchants National Bank of Mobile" to the Court of Claims.

summary.text: Refers to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims, a bill for the relief of a named bank. Directs the Commissioner to report to the Senate on the nature of the claim against the United States and the amount, if any, due such bank from the United States.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill S. 2052 entitled "A bill for the relief of The Merchants National Bank of Mobile" to the Court of Claims.
